content: Updated PR #90122 would wrap it with /usr/bin/timeout and as it is already wrapped in set +e it would continue without making use of the image cache. I have no idea though what the root cause is or why it started happening. The PR contains a list of failed jobs, the runners all have different numbers.

Possible. One job of the currently running bors auto workflow is 30 minutes "overdue" and will very likely time out as well: https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/3974672162?check_suite_focus=true
